content.text:
The Ignite UI Chip can be templated, deleted, and selected.
Multiple chips can be reordered and visually connected to each other.
Chips reside in a container called chips area which is responsible for managing the interactions between the chips.

summary.text: Chip is compact visual component that displays information in an obround.

can be dragged in order to change it's position.
By default it is set to false.

property that enables/disables the draggable element animation when the element is released.
By default it's set to true.

property that enables/disables the hiding of the base element that has been dragged.
By default it's set to true.

should render remove button and throw remove events.
By default it is set to false.
property that overrides the default icon that the chip applies to the remove button.

can be selected on click or through navigation,
By default it is set to false.
property that overrides the default icon that the chip applies when it is selected.

is disabled. When disabled it restricts user interactions
like focusing on click or tab, selection on click or Space, dragging.
By default it is set to false.
